Header.title: We are Kandra
Header.paragraph: We develop software. We fulfill our contracts.

About.paragraph: We are a group of experienced software developers that got together by reading books. Kandra is an idea that arises from the concept of adapting and following the contract. As in Brandon Sanderson's books (The Mistborn Saga) the Kandra race is specially known for following contracts no matter what the cost, and adapting their physical bodies to take on different appearances. We took that idea and created a software development company that follows these two principles to better serve our clients. We adapt. We fullfill.
Why: We cover a lot of different technologies

Features.title: We Adapt
Features.text: It does not matter what technologies you need, we can adapt to your needs.

Features.title: We follow our contract
Features.text: We care about your project and your initial vision for it.
